description: With infinite possibilities, this plugin adds Tasker support to Smartspacer. Configure your own Targets, Complications and Requirements, with any of the available templates and text formatting.
changelog:
- Added a Tasker Event for Smartspace showing/hiding, this can be used to update data or stop/start background work
- Added the ability to disable automatic length trimming on Complications content
- Allowed use in Automate without Tasker being installed
- Removed TruncateAt marquee option as it does nothing

Note: If the new visibility event is not working after updating, you may need to reboot.
